SEARCH
Package com.TheBigAdventure.mapBuiler

Class Case

java.lang.Object
com.TheBigAdventure.mapBuiler.Case
public final class Case extends Object
The Case class represents a grid cell in the game map. It can contain various entities such as Environnement, Character, and InsideInventory. The state of the Case is determined by the ActionType, indicating the type of action that can be performed on the cell.

This class provides methods to create instances of Case with different entities, check if the case is walkable, retrieve information about the entities in the case, and draw the entities on the game map.

Instances of this class are immutable and can be updated using methods like withCharacterEntity, withItem, and withEnvironnementEntity.

    • draw

      public final void draw(Graphics2D graphics, int sizeX, int sizeY, GameMap gameMap)
      Draws the entities in the case on the game map using the specified graphics context, size dimensions, and game map information.
      Parameters:
      graphics - The graphics context used for drawing.
      sizeX - The width of the case.
      sizeY - The height of the case.
      gameMap - The game map containing information about the game environment.
